name: Attack of the red balls II
name_original: Attack of the red balls II
description: A game where you control 2 balls that have to get out of rooms. One of the balls is controlled using the arrow keys while the other using WASD. In each level the balls are moving faster than in the one before that and every level the number of walls increase and so does the number of red balls. If you hit a red ball, you lose. If you hit a blue ball you earn 1 or 2 points.
